title: How to Cut a Watermelon Without Taking It out of the Refrigerator

steps.headline: If you have a door alarm disable it.
Either cut a watermelon in half, or get a half cut watermelon
Next cut a slit in the watermelon in the shape of a triangle (slit can be of any size)(make sure the slit cuts the skin of the watermelon)
From the end of the cut in the watermelon's skin, start cutting a few inches backward (you can cut back as much as you want)
Now on the 2 sides of the triangular slit, cut as far back as the depth of cut you made in the skin.
Once you've cut the depth, you place the knife as deep as you cut
Next powerfully but carefully make a dip-cut.
Pull the slice away from the half watermelon.

text: First open your refrigerator.  If you have a door alarm disable it.  Either cut a watermelon in half, or get a half cut watermelon  Next cut a slit in the watermelon in the shape of a triangle (slit can be of any size)(make sure the slit cuts the skin of the watermelon)  From the end of the cut in the watermelon's skin, start cutting a few inches backward (you can cut back as much as you want)  Now on the 2 sides of the triangular slit, cut as far back as the depth of cut you made in the skin.  Once you've cut the depth, you place the knife as deep as you cut  Next powerfully but carefully make a dip-cut.  Pull the slice away from the half watermelon.  Enjoy!
